Falters at times: The claim falters by presenting a partial quote from Joe Biden and not providing the full context of his statement.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that Joe Biden will raise taxes for all Americans.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation that Joe Biden's statement about raising taxes was directed at a specific individual who had benefited from the Republican-led tax bill.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Joe Biden did not say he will raise taxes on everyone, but rather addressed those who had benefited from the tax bill.
Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the impact of Joe Biden's tax plan by suggesting that all Americans will have their taxes raised.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes the problematic assumption that Joe Biden's statement about raising taxes applies to all Americans, when it was directed at a specific individual in the context of the Republican tax bill.
